name: cantarus-polydeploy-client
description: Deploy extensions to a DNN site using the Cantarus PolyDeploy client
author: Engage Software

inputs.name: deploy-path
inputs.label: Deploy Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path in which to find the packages to deploy

inputs.name: target-uri
inputs.label: Target URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL to the DNN site to which extensions will be deployed

inputs.name: api-key
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The API key of the PolyDeploy API user

inputs.name: encryption-key
inputs.label: Encryption Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Encryption key of the PolyDeploy API user

inputs.name: installation-status-timeout
inputs.label: Installation Status Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of seconds to ignore 404 errors when checking installation status
